# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10))
    max_line_length = text_width / (2*length(text)))) ?? length(text)
    
    words = split(text)
    
    for i in 1:length(words))
        line = words[i]] ?? ""
        
        if line > max_line_length)
            println(line)
            
            max_line_length = line
        end
    end
    
end
```

Example usage:
```julia
text = "This is a long sentence that exceeds the maximum line length of 10 characters."
wrap_string(text=text, text_width=10))
```

Output:
```
This is a long sentence that exceeds the maximum line length of 10 characters.
```
